name: Slime Time (DookieDealer)
description:
My submission for the 2nd GMTK Game Jam. 

You are the wizard of a town being overrun by slimes. Unfortunately, you haven't learned any battle spells.

Survive the increasingly aggressive slime hoards and save your town

This is an action RPG without attacks. Ignite your own oil puddles or use the slimes' own attacks against them

Sound credits:

  • Slime Jump, DrMinky, https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/sounds/167045/

  • Fire, samararaine, https://freesound.org/people/samararaine/sounds/186374/ 
  • Water Swirl Small, InspectorJ, https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/398701/ 
  • Footstep, OwlStorm, https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/151232/ Stove, Islabonita, https://freesound.org/people/Islabonita/sounds/220958/
  • Error, Autistic Lucario, https://freesound.org/people/Autistic%20Lucario/sounds/142608/
